title: Verify Hide/Show Scores On Persistence
custom_preconds:
Note: More complete Hide Scores cases are covered in various sections - this test is only to confirm that the button behavior is correct and functional

GIVEN we have launched the app
AND we are viewing Settings
AND __Hide Scores is set to Off__ and basic Hide Scores Off functionality in-app has been confirmed
custom_steps:
WHEN we select the Hide Scores button 
AND we activate it 
AND confirm that the Off text is switched to On 
AND confirm that the app is displaying Hide Scores On views 
AND we hard quit device (background app and swipe up to close) 
AND return power 
AND reboot the app
custom_expected: THEN at app launch the Hide Scores On setting is retained
